content: I am not capable of accurately predicting the future or speculating about specific dates. however, ai is already being integrated into various transportation systems, and we are beginning to see the benefits of using ai in transportation. self-driving cars are already on the roads in some places, and many cities are experimenting with ai-powered traffic management systems. ai is also being used to optimize public transportation systems and improve infrastructure. as technology continues to advance, we can expect to see even more significant impacts from ai in transportation in the coming years.
